summary: Doug's girlfriend leaves him and he falls apart. He finds a hurt "not duck" on the roof and ends looking after it. He meets cute, single bird specialist Holly at the zoo.
cast: Rhys Darby|Faye Smythe|Alvin Maharaj|Wesley Dowdell|David Fane|Craig Hall|Mia Pistorius|Sally Hawkins|Emily Barclay|Bryan Brown|Sonia Gray|Zaverr Doctor|Hannah Matthews|John Leigh|John Callen|Alan Harris|Michaela Rooney|Beck Taylor|Martin Devlin|Tane Cullen|Eryn Wilson|Allan Border|Ian Smith|Matthew Metcalfe|Bronwyn Bradley|Sara Wiseman|Stacey Leilua|John Enright|Adam Gardiner|Mayen Mehta
title: Love Birds
